SEARCH
Package graph

Class PlusAgent

java.lang.Object
graph.PlusAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Agent
public class PlusAgent extends Object implements Agent
Represents an agent that performs addition on values received from two input topics and publishes the result to an output topic.

The PlusAgent subscribes to two input topics to receive numeric values, adds these values, and publishes the result to an output topic.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlusAgent

      public PlusAgent(String[] subs, String[] pubs)
      Constructs a PlusAgent that subscribes to the specified input topics and publishes the result to the specified output topic.

      The agent subscribes to the first two topics in the subs array and publishes the result to the topic in the pubs array.

      Parameters:
      subs - an array containing the names of the input topics
      pubs - an array containing the names of the output topics

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of this agent.
      Specified by:
      getName in interface Agent
      Returns:
      the name of this agent

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the numeric values used for addition to 0.

      This method initializes num1 and num2 to 0.

      Specified by:
      reset in interface Agent

    • callback

      public void callback(String topic, Message msg)
      Processes a callback by updating the numeric values based on the topic and message, and publishes the result of the addition to the output topic.

      If the topic corresponds to input1 or input2, the respective numeric value is updated. If both input values have been received, the sum is calculated and published to the output topic.

      Specified by:
      callback in interface Agent
      Parameters:
      topic - the name of the topic from which the message was received
      msg - the message containing the numeric value

    • close

      public void close()
      Unsubscribes from all input topics and removes this agent as a publisher from the output topic.

      This method ensures that the agent no longer receives updates or sends messages to the topics it was associated with.

      Specified by:
      close in interface Agent

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this PlusAgent to another object for equality.

      Two PlusAgent instances are considered equal if they have the same input topics and output topic.

      Specified by:
      equals in interface Agent
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be compared
      Returns:
      true if this agent is equal to the specified object, false otherwise
